name: Confucius
what_did:
Confucius taught people how to live well in families and societies.
He believed in respect, education, and doing what is right.
His ideas were written down by his students and shaped Chinese life for thousands of years.
why_matters:
Confucius influenced how people in East Asia think about family, learning, and leadership.
His teachings are still studied today and help people think about good behavior and wisdom.

questions.q: What was one important idea of Confucius?

options: His ideas helped many people live better lives

fun_fact: Confucius loved learning so much, he said, 'Learning without thinking is useless!'
